name: CVEAutoFixer
description: **CVEAutoFixer** is an internal tool that automates the detection and resolution of security vulnerabilities across a mesh of repositories. It identifies CVEs, applies safe upgrades, and automatically creates commits and pull requestsâ€”streamlining secure code delivery.

name: ElevaSync
description: The GUI application optimizes elevator movement through the C-SCAN Algorithm and Multithreading. Leveraging the C-SCAN algorithm, ElevaSync efficiently schedules elevator requests within floors, minimizing wait times.

name: LogOps
description: Is a powerful log management solution designed to streamline log analysis, error detection, and performance tracking within organizations. It empowers teams to gain actionable insights from application logs efficiently.

name: AlertOps
description: Is an Incident Alerting and Management Solution seamlessly integrating AWS CloudWatch Alarms with PagerDuty, ensuring timely notifications and efficient task assignments.

name: Titanic Survivor Prediction
description: By analyzing historical passenger data, we build a machine-learning model that predicts survival outcomes based on various features such as passenger class, age, gender, and fare.
